meanings.sent1: The prerinsed vegetables made cooking dinner faster.
meanings.sent2: She always buys prerinsed lettuce for her salads.
meanings.sent3: The cat was surprised to see the prerinsed bowl before dinner.
meanings.sent4: His prerinsed car gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The prerinsed clothes smelled fresh and clean.

meanings.sent1: The store sells prerinsed fruits for convenience.
meanings.sent2: The prerinsed windows sparkled in the morning light.
meanings.sent3: The students were amazed by the prerinsed classroom before the party.
meanings.sent4: Her prerinsed bike was ready for the race.
meanings.sent5: The prerinsed dishes were stacked neatly in the cupboard.
